dcterms:description: A2D2 is an autonomous driving dataset that covers various driving scenarios and captures large static objects for object detection, including 3D bounding box annotations and instance segmentation annotations for all available traffic participants.
dcterms:title: A2D2

dcterms:creator: P. Warden
dcterms:description: The Google Speech Command dataset consists of single spoken words for keyword spotting systems, recorded in approximately one-second recordings.
dcterms:title: Google Speech Command dataset

dcterms:creator: J. Stallkamp
M. Schlipsing
J. Salmen
C. Igel
dcterms:description: The German Traffic Sign Recognition Benchmark is a multi-class classification competition dataset that provides a comprehensive collection of traffic sign images for training and testing recognition algorithms.
dcterms:title: German Traffic Sign Recognition Benchmark

dcterms:creator: S. Sun
C.-F. Yeh
M. Ostendorf
M.-Y. Hwang
L. Xie
dcterms:description: Aurora-4 is a dataset used for training augmentation with adversarial examples for robust speech recognition, focusing on improving the performance of automatic speech recognition systems.
dcterms:title: Aurora-4
